data.oai_dc:dc: Terrestrial arthropods of Steel Creek - Coleoptera

The beetles included within this data set were collected at Steel Creek, Buffalo National River, Newton County, Arkansas between April and December 2013 using a variety of collecting techniques. The spreadsheet uses Darwin Core headings, which are defined in the ReadMe file.
arthropod sampling|Malaise trap|pitfall trap|colored pan trap|Lindgren funnel trap|Berlese-Tullgren|state record|range expansion|endemic
